content.detailedDescription:
My wife, my friend and myself were out for a ride earlier this evening when we decided to go to a secluded part of town and see if we could see any lights that we have been seeing for the past few weeks. it was around 2247 hrs and i started to look in the sky toward town, we were all looking in different directions at the time. after about 5 minutes of not seeing anything i decided to smoke a cigarette and that is when i noticed on the horizon approximately 1000' up a very bright orb moving at a fast pace above the trees, i said for everyone to look where i was looking and they noticed it also, while looking at the one that was off to the north of us i turned to look in the opposite direction and noticed that there was a second and also a third object in the sky above us. the second one was closer than the first. this one was triangular shaped and had three very distinct lights that did not flash or strobe they stayed on the whole time that this was in motion the other two were round in shape. whatever the objects were scared the life out of my service animal. after watching these objects in the sky i noticed in the distance that there was a few military aircraft that were on a path to intercept the objects. we were all awestruck when we saw these. my wife and i have been watching the lights in the sky at around the same time every night in different locations. i am not willing to give up the location for fear that the wrong people will try to step in and say that we are not seeing anything but "weather balloons" or something to that effect. my dog was poking her head out of the window of our truck and started to whimper and shake really bad. enough that i had to comfort her and let her know that everything was alright. 
we lost sight of the three objects when they went lower than the horizon and we saw the military going after them.
content.summary: We were out looking for lights on a deserted area in the town

content.detailedDescription:
As witnessed from burdette park near the lake facing south, the object appeared approximately in the southern sky, above the treeline near the road by the main entrance to the park.

at first notice i assumed the object to be an aircraft until watching for a little lover a minute and noticing it had no observable movement.  the object had what appeared to be 2 flashing lights, which alternated side to size every one or two seconds and were white.  another plane was visible above at the same time and differing in that it had both red and white lights and that its white lights pulsed in unison, with a steady red light(s), as well as easily observable motion.  also a helicopter flew almost directly overhead during the sighting at fairly low altitude and in a southwesterly direction.

after watching for about two minutes the object began to move either down or southward out of view, spanning the distance from its location to out of view below the treetops in less than 5-10 seconds.

i attempted to record the object from my phone but don't believe i was successful, however i did pan and capture the helicopter and possibly the (other?) plane during their flyovers.

i can forward the video file if you believe it'd be of any use.
content.summary: Hovering object in southern sky

content.detailedDescription: As a line of thunderstorms were approaching from my west i noticed a single red sphere rising above and behind the roof of row of townhomes to my north. at first i thought it was a low flying jet on approach for a landing at des moines airport. the red light was solid but flickered just a little. after a few seconds the upward vertical motion stopped and it became stationary in the sky even though the wind was gusting ahead of the storm. i quickly determined it did not have faa strobe lights on it. the red light remained completely stationary for about a minute and then it slowly began to drift to the west for a few seconds. it lost a little bit of altitude when doing this. it then drifted off to the east for a few seconds and lost a little more altitude in the process. it then drifted back to the west but stopped in the original spot where it was previously going vertical in the sky but it was at a slightly lower altitude than before. the red sphere remained in this stationary position for several minutes. it slowly began to fade in terms of brightness while remaining stationary. i was unable to determine if the light source had faded out on its own or it just appeared to fade out because a cloud had obscured my view of the object.
content.summary: Red light observed in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching fox with greta van sustern when i decided to return outside and look around.  i had been out earlier and didn't see anything unusual, about an hour before and stars weren't out yet.  i noticed what looked like a blinking star or possibly a plane as the lights were blinking red, green, yellow and over the course of an hour, became red, blue and yellow.  no sound.  it was in the southeast corner of the sky at first and hovered.  we looked with binoculars, but no  definitive outline and no distance change.  we originally saw it at 10:35 p.M. and went back out at 11 p.M. and from our vantage point, it had moved west by two inches visually, then stopped and hovered again.  it 11:30 p.M. it had moved barely to the west just behind a treetop, but the stars around it hadn't moved.  while we were looking, 2 planes went by it.  one above and one below.  it couldn't be a new tower or planes wouldn't go below it and we would've seen it before as we have lived here for over 5 years.  i had a "feeling" that it was watching me although i had no evidence of that.  at 11:35 p.M. as i was writing this, my husband said that while watching it, it moved suddenly "up" or straight north in our direction.  i do not wish to describe here what i "saw" and "felt " in detail as i am too weirded out!  please let me know what you find out.
content.summary: Blinking,hovering,moving,hovering, moving, gave me "images & feelings"

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10:30 p.M. i was in my kitchen and i walked by the window,the window in the kitchen looks out over the backyard and the neighbors backyard. i had to do a double take and look back and what i saw really puzzled me. about 40-50 yards away in the neighbor backyard there was a sphere. it was floating about 7 feet off the ground and it was about 5 feet tall and wide. it hovered just under a tree. it was perfectly round, the inside looked like the inside of a plasma ball. but what really puzzled me about the whole thing was it had a weird eerie purple glow to it. it did not move it just floated there in mid air, for about 2 minutes. the kitchen was silent and the window was open and from what i could tell it was not making any noise. slowly it started to get smaller and shrink with in its self, it took a matter of 30 seconds to completely disappear.
content.summary: it was perfectly round, the inside looked like the inside of a plasma ball

content.detailedDescription:
On christmas eve i was sleeping on the couch by the tree and i put a $50 gift certificate in it there were two others for my brothers and one for me, i fell asleep all doors and window were locked and i was the only one in the house, i awoke from my sleep but still half awake and i saw 1 little grey alien and 3 men in black walk stright threw the patio door yet this door was a glass door that was broken so it was boarded up and could not be opened they walked straight threw it. i recognized them as the alien and mib and telepathically i heard the notice me that i was waking up the alien looked at me and then they all turned into people i recognize like family so i then just paseed it off and went back to sleep, in the morniong the gift certificat that was addressed to me was missing i searched the entire hose and found nothing yet the ones for my brothers were still there.

i feel the aliens are watching me and manipulating the events of my life to achieve thier goals for what ever reason i dont know
content.summary: Grey alien and men in black walk threw wall

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying on my patio looking at the stars when a triangular  formation of 7 lights sped overhead at high speed from north to south, the time it took these objects to transverse the entire sky was 2-3 seconds. i went inside to tell someone and then went back outside, and again these objects passed by again however this time the object on the left side flew off and did a manuver and returned into the formation again it only took them 2-3 seconds to travel across the entire sky, 

i heard that when a pilot crashes the airforce will do a flyby and one plane will fly off and return to formation

these did the same thing however the speed is not a plane or satalite for these take a very long time to travel across the sky 

considering the simalrity to usa air force leads me to believe that these object are a black ops craft like an unmaned stealth craft like in the movie stealth but i have never seen a human craft travel so fast even our space ships going 40,000mph take a few minutes to travel across the entire sky
content.summary: 7 lights in formation traveling at high speed

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on the porch when i joined my boyfriend to watch a thunderstorm start. it was only thundering and lightening from a distance in front of us but not at our house yet. then i was about to head inside and my boyfriend said "hey come look at this quick" and when i stuck my head off the porch and looked up all the way to my left i saw some odd object moving. it was dark and circular spinning and moving in a fast straight line over our building in our vision until about 8 seconds later  when it was all the way to my right side and disappeared. it was below the clouds then towards the end went into them. i have never seen anything like this. it was so fast i wish i had my phone to take a video it was incredible. it was fast and the lights were crazy like nothing i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Waiting for storm to start noticed a object with about 4 lights flashing in wierd pattern spinning moving in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the begining of kojack on tv. the tv channal changed by itself. when i went to turn my channal back on it wouldent moove it was frozen stuck. my bedroom light went out. i was laying in bed. and i saw out the window it just apeared then stoped. i got very afrade then it slowly went away. it was like a bright white light. round. as it mooved the edges of it had like pointed lights that got smaller then biger then smaller and so on like it was walking like a spider on the sky. yrt it was not far from me. ambroso or a name that sounds like it interviewed me about my sighting. i talked to people from mudon about it at that year. the eact fate i saw it was the day it first came on the  tv news about trips to eternity where people left there kids there homes and left for the trip. it was after i saw this on the news on tv kojack started. then i saw it. i remember how it felt even today it felt evil. and i was deathly afraid. i wqas afraid it was going to get me if not now then later. i wouldent go out at night i stayed away from windows. and i was afraid to be alone from then on. i can tell you that i think what ever it was it is totaly evil. and dangerous. it felt like to me it was alive. you tell anyone that saw a ufo that they are evil. when i saw it a oer whelming force went in me and it felt evil. i was so afraid i was worried of having a heart attack. it wanted me. is there some people thaat can protect people that saw a ufo..  i remember what went in me that felt so evil even now today. i remember how it felt. then finaly the same week i reported it to the  police. because i was afraid. they plitly told me many people saw one and suggested i just go home and forget it. i did ut i never forgot it.. and i cant stress enought to you that it was evil. never try to comtact a ufo. dont get intristed in them. is my advice to anyone that winders about them. and i cant find the right words to describe how afraid  i was. i was like afraid for my sole. it wanted me.
content.summary: It looked like it was crawleing on the sky when it mooved

content.detailedDescription: At about 1am (june 12, 2012), roughly 45 degrees above horizon looking due north, i witnessed what appeared at first to be a faint star, blue/white in color. i realized the object was moving against the background of other stars. objects speed was constant (unchanging) and i wondered if perhaps i was seeing some reflective object in orbit such as a large satellite/etc. roughly 5 to 10 seconds later the object (very) suddenly accelerated away at a high rate of speed and became fainter and fainter. as it sped away i could track it for only about 5 seconds before it was too faint for me to make it out any longer. i witnessed the same thing about two weeks prior at about the same time of day while looking at the stars in the east, except that one started out completely stationary. it believe it was only by dumb luck that i happened to be looking right at it when it began to move. neither object appeared to have red, green, or white strobe lights characteristic of the other aircraft often seen flying through our airspace, and the rate of acceleration appeared extraordinarily conspicuous. i have no training as a pilot and little astronomical experience, but i do not believe these were any mundane objects entering the atmosphere, nor do i believe them to be any conventional aircraft due to the fact that the first object initially appeared to be (relative to other stars) stationary, and they both accelerated away. both sightings occurred during clear skies. i used nearby stars as well as the rooftop of the house and the treeline as visual reference during each sighting.
content.summary: Distant star-like object moving slowly at first, and quickly accelerating away leaving a streak of light as it went.

content.detailedDescription: My brother saw the news story about the ufo report from mitchelville iowa and remembered that he had seen a strange light a day or 2 earlier and took a picture with his cellphone. he was leaving for work when he saw it. he noticed the bright light and the movement. he didn't know but living near an airport we see a lot of aircraft at all hours. this was way too big and was pure white and too fast and quiet. an aircraft that big would have been slower and loud and the marker and warning lights would have been visible. it was just a white orb, really bright and it seemed round. he was confused as to what he saw. he has never been a believer in ufos or life on other planets. he certainly didn't believe he would ever see such a thing but there it was. and he had the presents of mind to take a picture before it disappeared behind the horizon line.
content.summary: A bright light flying over des moines in the early morning on june 4th. 2012.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my hammock and enjoying a beer (1) just after sunset.  i noticed a bright white light appear on the western horizon and tracked it steadily east until it disappeared again over horizon.  way too bright to be a satellite, stars were not yet visible.  no flashing or blinking faa lights, no sound. i went inside & grabbed my binoculars to get a closer look - to the naked eye object appeared to be a single white light, however when viewed through binoculars object was five lights arranged in a circular pattern.
content.summary: Flyby

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping on the western slope of the sangres taking night time, time-lapse photographs of the stars between 12am and 1:30am on june 9th-10th. i had been looking into the sky for hours when i noticed a brilliant orange light hovering over the sand dunes to the north of my position. it hovered, unwavering, at a 25 degree angle, very low in the sky. it was at least 5x brighter and larger than any star in the sky. since i have been to the san luis valley many times before, i knew there were no towns or a population of any kind in the mountains where the object was hovering and have never witnessed such events, whether viewing stars, planes or otherwise. 

after approximately 10 minutes, perhaps a bit less, the object disappeared. shortly after, it reappeared a few miles from its previous position more toward the san luis lakes area. it moved very slowly and deliberately toward the sangres, and took about 3 minutes to travel across my field of vision and out of my view over the mountains. as it moved, it remained silent and a steady, brilliant orange color. as it neared the mountains, i noticed 3 distinct 'wobbles' in its pattern, like a bobber in water - all of the characteristics of this flight was beyond anything i had ever seen before. i tried to take a photo of the object but, mysteriously, my camera would not turn on for about 30 seconds. i was finally able to snap 2 photos using the same exposure and shutter speed as previous photos i had taken that night, that inexplicably came out completely black. of the 100+ photos i took that night and the next day, these are the only photos that did not turn out.

shocked and still trying to process what i had just witnessed, i sat staring at the sky in the vicinity i had seen the object when i noticed movement over the sangres. at first i thought it was a satellite, since it looked like a star, but it moved much too slowly. i then noticed 3 more objects, identical to the first, flying in a rectangular formation, all completely in sync. after about 1 minute the objects reached the ambient light of the moon and i lost sight of them. a minute later, another identical object followed the same path as the 4 before it except this one had a light that flashed brightly in my direction every 15 seconds exactly. it reminded me of a lighthouse beacon - the beam hitting my vantage point every 15 seconds as if it were rotating. i followed this object  until i lost sight in the light of the moon, as well. all objects traveled from north to south along the sangres and i viewed each of them for approximately one minute. i sat and watched for the next hour for more activity, but saw none.
content.summary: 2 sightings within 20 minutes near great sand dunes.

content.detailedDescription: Three ufo's hovering in place for about 5 minutes then one moved down and the sun reflected off its top. they where silver in color. photo is from brazil seen in 2006 like mine!
content.summary: Saw three ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my son were walking to my moms apt. around 6 pm.When a low flying older world war 2 looking plane flew by. so i stopped to show my son.After it had passed we began walking and i looked up again and noticed a jet very very high up going by. leaving trails.I than noticed a circular metallic object that seemed to be higher than the jet. in a stationary position.It was so high up that when i looked down "were me and my son were walking" and looked back up it would take me a few seconds to find it again. would have noticed it if the jet would not had flown somewhat by it from my perspective.We walked about 2 more blocks and sat down in a empty parking lot so i could show my son who is 5 years old. sitting and watching it i could see the sun reflecting off the side of the object that we were facing. it appeared to be closer and above the hospital area. and moving in in many different directions but was so high up that i could not tell how fast. we than started walking the rest of the way to my moms apt which was a block passed the hospital. i tryed to find it again but could not. i believe that it could have been cause the refection of the sun would have been on the opposite side 
of the object but thats just a theory :).
content.summary: U.F.O spotted very high.

content.detailedDescription:
First week of may 2012

my oldest daughter and i were driving east on highway 150 out of vinton about half way to urbana. the sky was clear but for a few fluffy white clouds (cumulus clouds) it was about 3:30 in the afternoon. i noticed the outline of a triangular shaped object. it was transparent you could see the sky through it. but the edges and the sky seen through the object were blurry and slightly darker then the rest of the sky. i watched as the object rolled to were it grew very thin were you could hardly see it and then continued to roll and was seen the same as before. i watched as this object did this for about 1-2 mins. then it rolled and was just gone!! that is when i heard my daughter say ���did you see that two!!!��� that is when i first realized she had stopped talking to and had been staring at the object to. i am not sure how far away the object was but it was about half way from the horizon to the noon position. so easily seen through the windshield. the size was the same width as the road when you would compare the road and the object.
content.summary: Transparent triangular shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
My wife jen was feeding our newborn son at 4:00 am when she notice a light out in the distance over the street lights. it was a glowing light orange that looked to be hovering or moving very slowly. moving up and down for about 5-10 minutes. she then woke me up and i saw the same movements. we went downstairs and out to our patio and saw it moving very slow towards us at what seemed like 300-500 feet in the dark sky. i ran in to grab the camera as it started to pass over us. that is the photo i got, not the best due to no flash. i could see details of the object when the lights flashed. it looked like a steath shape, but was lighter in color..Like grey. it did look like something our military could be testing. just seemed strange at 4:00 am...No way was it a commercial plane. the sound was so minimal, humming. i have heard military jets and they are very loud and rumble...This was not the case. had multiple lights flashing the whole time. finally flew over our house and headed west towards syracuse, ny

the photo is not the best i did zoom in and hopefully you can make more out of it
content.summary: Glowing light out in the distance. hovering, moving up and down. flew over us very slow

content.detailedDescription: Between 10pm and 11pm, i had finished a walk and stopped to check the mailbox before going inside. i glanced up and saw a very bright star-like light. its  size and brightness would be similar to venus. at first i thought it was a helicopter searchlight. the object seemed to be flying at about the same height a helicopter would and at about the same speed. however, it was close enough that i would have been able to hear a helicopter and most likely see the shape of the body. i could only see the light and there was no sound. the light was bright and -for lack of a better word- twinkling. it was not like a searchlight beam. i watched it for about 15 seconds before i lost track of it behind the trees. the path the object took (from the point i first saw it) was a smooth u-shaped arc coming from and then returning to a northerly path.
content.summary: Very bright star-like light makes a u-turn over my house

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking out side from seeing it from my living room

2. when i was looking at it though my window

3.I don't now it didn't make a sound 

4.Well it looked like an circle or something like that

5. i was excited and run out the door and saw it again

6.When i told my uncle about and they saw it and did not really say anything
content.summary: I was in my living room and look out side though my window and saw somthing floating and went out side and saw it again and it kepp going straight

content.detailedDescription: I was working on a bulk carrier on lake huron between canada and the us , as we were on deck closing cargo hold hatches i looked up to the port side we were travelling north about half way up the lake , and i witnesses a glowing tranparent sphere. yellow gold in colour around 8 o'clock at night as i viewed this object it looked like what i thought was the moon but the moon was clearly visible.So i called over two of my crewmates. who also witnessed this event and as we were looking at it wondering. it changed shape from orb to horizontal spinning vortes which continued for about a min the back to small or and dissintegrated pretty quickly.
content.summary: Glowing yellow gold sphere turned into vortex and dissintegrated over lake huron
content.locationName: Lake huron half way north, Michigan
